Adult male.description: Adult male Western Bluebirds have a fully blue throat and chestnut shoulders whereas adult male Eastern Bluebirds have a orange throat and blue shoulders.

Female/immature.description: Female/immature Western Bluebirds have a dusky throat and belly unlike female/immature Eastern Bluebirds, which have a white throat and belly.

Adult male.description: Adult male Mountain Bluebirds are a lighter sky blue than Eastern Bluebirds, without the orangish underparts.

Female/immature.description: Female/immature Mountain Bluebirds have a pale cinnamon chin and belly unlike female/immature Eastern Bluebirds, which have a white chin and belly.

Breeding male.description: Indigo Buntings are smaller than Eastern Bluebirds with a thick finchlike bill. Breeding males are entirely blue and unlike Eastern Bluebirds, which have an orangish breast.

Female/immature.description: Indigo Buntings are smaller than Eastern Bluebirds with a thick finchlike bill. Females/immatures are browner overall compared to the more slate gray female/immature Eastern Bluebirds.
